content:
Hi,
I've been looking into FHIR Genomics for the past year (no genomics background and no domain expert) and it feels like some links to the FHIR Genomics IG page leads to different versions.
Since FHIR Genomics is still being worked on by the WG, I thought the IG got updated but I've only recently noticed that I was being sent to different versions (either by google search, some other FHIR page, etc).

Which of the two links below is the most current IG?

  1. http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/2019Jan/index.html
  2. http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/

Also,
I've noticed a change in Variant reporting page?

  1. http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/2019Jan/sequencing.html
  2. http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/sequencing.html

Thanks!
Sanggy has marked this topic as resolved.
